help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

region.label: Region
region.description: Specify the region of the Amazon Athena data source

s3_bucket_location.label: Amazon S3 Bucket Location
s3_bucket_location.description: Specify the location of the S3 bucket where query results will be stored

vpcflow_database_name.label: VPC Flow Logs database name
vpcflow_database_name.description: Specify the name of the database containing the VPC Flow Logs

vpcflow_table_name.label: VPC Flow Logs table name
vpcflow_table_name.description: Specify the name of the table containing the VPC Flow Logs

guardduty_database_name.label: Amazon GuardDuty database name
guardduty_database_name.description: Specify the name of the database containing the Amazon GuardDuty logs

guardduty_table_name.label: Amazon GuardDuty table name
guardduty_table_name.description: Specify the name of the table containing the Amazon GuardDuty logs

result_limit.label: Result Size Limit
result_limit.description: The maximum number of entries or objects that are returned by search query.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

time_range.label: Query Time Range
time_range.description: Time range for the search, in minutes, represented as last x minutes.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

timeout.label: Query Response Timeout Limit
timeout.description: The limit on how long to wait for the data source response, in seconds. Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

search_timeout.label: Query Search Timeout Limit
search_timeout.description: The limit on how long the query will run, in minutes, on the data source.

dialects.label: Dialect
dialects.description: If data source needs to search multiple schema or database tables

validate_pattern.label: STIX Pattern Validator
validate_pattern.description: Validate STIX patterns that needs to be translated into native data source query

mapping.label: Custom Mapping
mapping.description: Custom stix mapping if default mapping needs to be replaced

concurrent.label: Concurrent Search Limit
concurrent.description: The number of simultaneous connections that can be made between IBM Cloud Pak™ for Security and the data source.  Valid input range is {{min}} to {{max}}.

aws_access_key_id.label: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication

aws_iam_role.label: AWS IAM Role
aws_iam_role.description: AWS IAM Role is required for only AWS role-based authentication

aws_secret_access_key.label: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key ID is required for both AWS key-based and role-based authentication
